author: pbs.org
title: Why we need poetry to slow us down PBS NewsHour
text: For MacArthur fellow Ellen Bryant Voigt, nature has always served as an inspiration for her poetry. She speaks about her love for natural beauty and need for solitude, as well as poetryâ€™s gift for slowing us down.
